data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Jaiswara, Ranjana, Desutter-Grandcolas, Laure (2017): Description of two smallest field crickets from South America, Laureopsis nauta Jaiswara gen. nov., sp. nov. and Perugryllus estiron Jaiswara gen. nov., sp. nov. (Orthoptera, Grylloidea, Gryllidae, Gryllinae). Zootaxa 4350 (3), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4350.3.6|5 occurrences
